Social And Cultural Activities: Worked for the welfare of the poor farmers and agricultural labourers in the rural areas of Nanded district, providing facilities of drinking water, construction of link-roads, electricity,specially in Dalit basti area of Nanded, implementation of Govt. schemes regarding Sanjay Gandhi Niradhar Yojana and Shetakari Pension Yojana in Biloli Taluka of Nanded
Profession: Agriculturist Engineer Political and Social Worker Industrialist
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Reading, co-operative movements, providing educational facilities in rural areas
Special Interests: Upliftment of agricultural labourers, dry land farmers, rural development, water conservation programme,welfare of the people belonging to below Poverty Line in rural areas of Nanded
Educational Qualifications: B.E. (Mech.) Educated at Osmania University,Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh
